column2: I am looking for a new <ITEMWDESC>. My old one is falling apart.
column3: I could really use some cash, would you be interested in buying a <ITEMH>?
column4: Thank you. Now I can throw out the old one.

column2: I could use a new <ITEMWDESC>. The one I have now just doesn't do the job.
column3: I've been trying to get rid of this <ITEMH>. Maybe you want it?
column4: Thank you. Now I can throw out the old one.

column2: I always wanted a <ITEMWDESC>! I would pay anything to get my fingers on one.
column3: I've got a spare <ITEMH> if you want it.
column4: Thank you. Now I can throw out the old one.

column2: I like <CHARACTER>s peformance. An Autograph would be nice.
column3: I have an Autograph of <OCHAR>
column4: Oh, Thank you

column2: I love <CHARACTER>! An autograph would be great!
column3: I have an Autograph of <OCHAR>
column4: Great! Thank you very much!

column2: I am the biggest fan of <CHARACTER>! The only thing missing in my collection would be an autograph.
column3: I have an Autograph of <OCHAR>
column4: Awesome! How did you get that? Thank you very, very much!

column2: If you meet <CHARACTER>, could you remind <HIMHER> that <HESHE> owes me <MONEY> Cr.? If you can get it for me I'll let you keep 10%
column4: Oh, Thank you

column2: <CHARACTER> owes me <MONEY> Cr. I offer you 20% if you can get it for me.
column4: Great! Thank you very much!

column2: I am struggling to make ends meet, while <CHARACTER> still owes me <MONEY> Cr.! If you meet <HIMHER> please would you step on <HISHERS> toes? I am willing to give up 30% if anybody can get it.
column4: Finally! Thank you very much for your help

column2: We always have work for good engineers.
column3: I have some experience in that field. Do you know somebody who needs one?
column4: Oh? Thank's. I'll contact <OHIMHER>.

column2: Our engineering department is starting to run a backlog. We have the funds, now we just need the right person for the job.
column3: I have, and I have some time for side projects at the moment.
column4: That's good to know. Thanks for the information. I'll contact <OHIMHER>.

column2: Let's be honest. This place is falling apart. I really need a good engineer. Now. Though yesterday would be better.
column3: Yes, I have. And I am actually looking for work right now.
column4: That's great News! Thanks for telling me. I'll contact <OHIMHER> right away!

column2: I am doing research on <ITEMW>. Running a bit low at the moment
column3: I really have way too much <ITEMH>. Do you need any?
column4: Thank you!

column2: I am doing research on <ITEMW>, but I have run out of it. You think you can get me some?
column3: I've got some <ITEMH> to spare. Do you want it?
column4: Thank you!

column2: I am stuck in my research! I need <ITEMW> to continue!
column3: I guess I could spare some of this <ITEMH>. If it is worth my while.
column4: Thank you!

column2: I have. I would be interested in a trinket to show people where I have been.
column3: If you like it you can have it.
column4: That looks interesting! Thank you!

column2: I've heard of that. I'd be interested in buying.
column3: I would be ready to let go of it for a price
column4: That looks interesting! Thank you!

column2: I have. If they are as interesting as people claim I'd be interested in buying. I am looking for something exotic, something to kick off a conversation, representative of this sector.
column3: I really like it too. You'd have to offer a decent price if you want it.
column4: That looks interesting! Thank you!

column2: I am always looking for new tools. Nothing particular right now though.
column3: I've got some tools to sell. Interested in buying?
column4: Oh yeah, I could need those. Thank you very much!

column2: If I had some better tools, I could work a lot better!
column3: I am not using some of my tools. Maybe you would want to buy them?
column4: Ah just what I needed! Thanks!

column2: I can't do anything right now! I just don't have the tools!
column3: My toolbox is getting to full. Got some great stuff to sell!
column4: Finally! Thank you very much!

column2: Lately the audience seemed a little bored. A new show concept would be nice.
column3: I've had this Idea for a show for <OCHAR>
column4: That sounds like a neat idea. Thank you

column2: I wasn't able to fill halls like I used to. I need to work on a new show concept.
column3: I've had a great idea for a show for <OCHAR>
column4: Oh, never thought of that. Thanks for sharing!

column2: What's wrong with my show? Nobody is coming anymore! Soon I will have to work as a cook
column3: I know how <OCHAR> can make a comeback. I've had some great ideas!
column4: Yay! Can you say comeback? I say this says comeback! Thank you very much!

column2: Stations sensors are really good. Having access to them would be helpful for my research.
column3: I do. But I don't need it anymore. You can have it if you want.
column4: Thank you! This will help a lot.

column2: If I only could get access to the station sensors, I could prove my thesis!
column3: I do. I could sell it to you.
column4: Thank you! Can't wait to use them.

column2: I really need access to the station sensors! I am on the verge of a scientific breaktrhough!
column3: I do. I could sell it to you.
column4: Thank you! Now I can finish my research.

column2: I need to be at station <DEST> by <TIME>. Can you help me? I can pay you <PAY> credits.
column3: I need to be at station <DEST> by <TIME>. Can you help me? I can pay you <PAY> credits.
column4: Thank you very much for the trip.

column4: Thank you very much for the trip.

column4: Thank you very much for the trip.

column3: I have <TONS> tons of cargo for station <DEST> but i have other pressing business. Would you be interested in the job?
I have <TONS> tons of cargo for station <DEST> but i have other pressing business. Would you be interested in the job?
I have <TONS> tons of cargo for station <DEST> but i have other pressing business. Would you be interested in the job?

column2: If we knew where the pirates bases were, they would be easier to avoid.
column3: I know where a piratebase is <->There is a piratebase at <PCORDS>
column4: Thank you. I will stay clear of that one

column2: Another merchant ship was destroyed a short while ago. If we only could warn them where they have to keep an eye on their sensor readings.
column3: I know where a piratebase is <->There is a piratebase at <PCORDS>
column4: Ah. Good to know! I will avoid that system then. Thank you!

column2: Spacetrade is about to grind to a halt! I need to know! Where are the pirate bases?
column3: I know where a piratebase is <->There is a piratebase at <PCORDS>
column4: This is vital information! Thank you very much

column2: Did you find any interesting planets, worth a visit?
column3: I know a very interesting place <->There is <SPLANET> at <PCORDS>
column4: Thanks. I'll take a look at that.

column2: My crew needs a challenge. Did you find any interesting planets, worth a visit?
column3: I know a very interesting place <->There is <SPLANET> at <PCORDS>
column4: Thanks. Sounds interesting and worth a visit.

column2: I could really use some excitement on my next trip! Do you know about any interesting planets?
column3: I know a very interesting place <->There is <SPLANET> at <PCORDS>
column4: Awesome! I must take a look at that immediately

column2: Do you know of any earthlike planets in this sector?
column3: I know about an earthlike planet <->The earthlike planet is at <PCORDS>. I think you would really enjoy it.
column4: Oh thanks! I am sure I will enjoy myself there!

column2: I really need to take a walk without a spacesuit! Do you know of any earthlike planets?
column3: I know about an earthlike planet <->The earthlike planet is at <PCORDS>. I think you would really enjoy it.
column4: Oh thanks! I am sure I will enjoy myself there!

column2: Are all planets in this sector uninhabitable? Please tell me, have you found any earthlike planets yet?
column3: I know about an earthlike planet <->The earthlike planet is at <PCORDS>. I think you would really enjoy it.
column4: Oh thanks! I am sure I will enjoy myself there!

column2: I've heard of an interesting paper by <CHARACTER>. I would like to read it.
column3: I just finished this research paper. Don't know if I am going to publish it.

column2: The paper by <CHARACTER> can propably help me solve my problem.
column3: I just finished this research paper. It's sure gonna turn some heads.

column2: I need <CHARACTER>s research paper! I can't continue my work without it.
column3: I just finished this research paper. Now I am looking for a buyer.

column2: I like to get ahead of our competition. I am always interested in info on <CORP>
column3: I've got their latest report if you want it.
column4: Thanks. Maybe I find something in here.

column2: I am suspicious <CORP> is up to something. If you know anything about them let me know.
column3: I've got their latest internal report, if you want it.
column4: Thanks. Maybe I find something in here.

column2: I know <CORP> is planning something! Any info you got on them would be highly appreciated!
column3: Can't tell you how I got it, but this report is top secret. I would sell it to you.
column4: Thanks. Maybe I find something in here.

column2: I need biodata for my research. I am only just starting out and the companies are really stingy when it comes to supplying independents.
column3: I've got some extra biodata I would be willing to sell
column4: Thats some interesting Data. Thank you.

column2: I still need some more biodata befor I can finish my research.
column3: I've got interesting biodata. I would be willing to sell it.
column4: Ah. Thanks! This looks interesting and I hate the paperwork.

column2: Just a bit more biodata and I can finish my research. You don't happen to have any?
column3: I've got highly interesting biodata. Do you want to buy it?
column4: Just what I needed! Thank you.

column2: I am always interested in data on anomalies.
column3: I've got some data on anomalies I don't really need.
column4: Thats some interesting Data. Thank you.

column2: My research on anomalies is going on well. I need a decent chunk of data to test my hypothesis. Then I can finish it.
column3: Ive got some interesting data on anomalies.
column4: Ah. Thanks! This looks interesting and I hate the paperwork.

column2: Just a little bit more of data and I can finish my research on anomalies.
column3: I've got very interesting data on anomalies. If you want it can be yours.
column4: Just what I needed! Thank you.

column2: I am always interested in new approaches for maintenance and repair procedures, born out of necessity.
column3: I've got this plan for emergency repairs. Do you want it?

column2: Right now I am stuck with a problem. I could really need some inspiration!
column3: I've got this plan for emergency repairs. Do you want to buy it?

column2: I have heard of something done by a SO that should be impossible. I would love to get my hands on those plans!
column3: I've got this revolutionary plan for emergency repairs. It's gonna cost you if you want it.
I am really looking forward to retire. Might you be interested in buying my ship?
If I want to get home I need to get rid of this ship! I'll make you an offer you can't refuse!
I can't stand the bloodshed and the horror anymore! I am going home. Firesale is what this is! Do you want my ship?
